name: Quadrapong
overview: Elimination!, better known by its Atari name Quadrapong, is the third official Pong game. Like Pong Doubles, up to 4 players can participate. The court is a square with an opening in each wall. A ball ricochets around the square, and each player must manipulate their paddle to protect their opening. Each player has a set number of misses, and after the ball passes through a player's opening four times, that player's opening closes and their paddle disappears, therefore they are "eliminated." The last player to have an open wall wins.
